attributes.action: ...provide parity between Soldiers (and other UK Forces) starting pay and other Public Servants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paramedic: Band 5, from £19,683 to £25,424. Up to 25% more for OOHs. 
Staff Nurse / Entry Midwife: Band 5 (Point 16) £20,710 (basic - outside London and more for Out of Hours work) 
Trainee firefighter: £20,896. When full competence is achieved, this rises to £27,851 (outside London). 
Teacher: £21,102 to £30,842 (outside London) 
Soldier: £780 paid. This is after tax, National Insurance, food and accommodation charges have been deducted. Thats £9360 per year. 
(Refs: Gov Websites - correct as of 1.10.09)
